paper_title: Determination of the order in Abstract fractional differential equations
abstract: In this paper we identify, for small $t$ and a fixed $T>0,$ the order $α>0$ in the abstract fractional differential equation $$\partial^αu(t)=Au(t),$$ where the time-fractional derivative $\partial^α$ is understood in the sense of Caputo and Riemann-Liouville, $A$ is a closed (possibly unbounded) linear operator in a Banach space $X,$ and $0<α<1$ or $1<α<2.$
